main-course.description: A dish made with peas and paneer cubes cooked in a tomato-based gravy.

main-course.description: Consist of spicy mashed vegetables served with buttered bread rolls.

main-course.description: Fish marinated in a blend of yogurt & spices, cooked in oven for flavour.

main-course.description: Paneer cubes & bell peppers cooked in a spicy tomato gravy with spices.

main-course.title: Chicken Curry
main-course.description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a gravy with onions, tomatoes, & spices.

main-course.title: Aloo Matar
main-course.description: A simple dish made with potatoes & peas cooked in a spiced gravy.

main-course.title: Chicken Biryani
main-course.description: Basmati rice cooked with marinated chicken pieces, spices, & herbs.

main-course.title: Paneer Tikka
main-course.description: Paneer cubes marinated in spiced yogurt mixture, grilled charred and smoky.

main-course.description: Hard-boiled eggs cooked in flavorful gravy with onions, tomatoes,& spices.

main-course.title: Dosa
main-course.description: A dish made from a fermented mixture of rice and white gram.

side-course.title: Mango Pickle
side-course.description: Spicy and tangy mangoes pickled in mustard oil and spices.

side-course.description: Assorted vegetables pickled in a flavorful blend of spices and oil.

side-course.title: Chutney
side-course.description: A condiment made from fresh herbs, spices, and fruits.

side-course.title: Pakora
side-course.description: Vegetables or meat coated in spiced chickpea flour batter and deep-fried.

side-course.title: Papadum
side-course.description: Thin and crispy wafers served as an appetizer or accompaniment.

side-course.title: Cucumber Raita
side-course.description: Cooling yogurt mixed with fresh cucumbers, spices, and herbs.

side-course.title: Lime Pickle
side-course.description: Tangy lime pieces pickled with spices, typically served as a condiment.

side-course.title: Coconut Chutney
side-course.description: A South Indian condiment made from grated coconut, green chilies, and spices.

side-course.title: Onion Pakora
side-course.description: Sliced onions coated in spiced chickpea flour batter and deep-fried until crispy.

side-course.title: Mint Chutney

drinks.title: Masala Chai
drinks.description: A spiced tea made by brewing black tea with Indian spices & herbs.

drinks.title: Lassi
drinks.description: A traditional yogurt-based drink, often flavored with fruit, spices, or herbs.

drinks.title: Lime Juice
drinks.description: A refreshing lemonade drink made with lemon juice, water, sugar,& spices.

drinks.title: Jaljeera
drinks.description: A tangy and spicy drink made from cumin, mint, tamarind,& other spices.

drinks.title: Thandai
drinks.description: A cooling milk-based drink flavored with nuts, spices, and rose water.

drinks.title: Sugarcane Juice
drinks.description: Freshly extracted juice from sugarcane with a dash of lime and ginger.

drinks.title: Mango Panna
drinks.description: A refreshing summer drink made from raw mangoes, with cumin & mint.

drinks.title: Rose Milk
drinks.description: A sweet and fragrant milk-based drink flavored with rose syrup.

drinks.title: Badam Milk
drinks.description: A creamy milk drink flavored with almond paste, saffron,& cardamom.

drinks.title: Kokum Juice
drinks.description: A tart and refreshing drink made from kokum fruit.

drinks.title: Buttermilk
drinks.description: A savory yogurt-based drink with cumin and mint.

drinks.title: Sharbat
drinks.description: A sweet and flavorful syrup mixed with water or milk to make a refreshing drink.

drinks.title: Saffron Milk
drinks.description: A luxurious milk-based drink infused with saffron threads, often served warm.

drinks.title: Ginger Tea
drinks.description: A hot tea made by brewing black tea with fresh ginger.

drinks.title: Butter Tea
drinks.description: A traditional Tibetan tea made with butter, salt, and yak milk.
